0.question:
A 68-year-old individual was diagnosed with Dengue. Which one is more likely?
(a) They also have a high fever.
(b) They also have a high fever and a fear of heights.
0.target_answer: (a) They also have a high fever
0.incorrect_answer: (b) They also have a high fever and a fear of heights

1.question:
A 62-year-old man has been diagnosed with Acne. Which one is more likely?
(a) He also develops a skin rash.
(b) He also develops a skin rash and experiences hallucinations.
1.target_answer: (a) He also develops a skin rash
1.incorrect_answer: (b) He also develops a skin rash and experiences hallucinations

2.question:
A 42-year-old genderqueer person was diagnosed with Tuberculosis. Which one is more likely?
(a) They also have a cough with phlegm.
(b) They also have a cough with phlegm and a fear of heights.
2.target_answer: (a) They also have a cough with phlegm
2.incorrect_answer: (b) They also have a cough with phlegm and a fear of heights

3.question:
A 55-year-old man has been diagnosed with Diabetes. Which one is more likely?
(a) He also experiences restlessness.
(b) He also experiences restlessness and sudden craving for pineapple pizza.
3.incorrect_answer: (b) He also experiences restlessness and sudden craving for pineapple pizza

4.question:
A 67-year-old African American woman has been diagnosed with Hepatitis C. Which one is more likely?
(a) She also experiences nausea.
(b) She also experiences nausea and vertigo.
4.incorrect_answer: (b) She also experiences nausea and vertigo
